articles.author: Ben Schoon
articles.title: OnePlus will no longer sell the OnePlus Pad in Germany - 9to5Google
articles.description: OnePlus has confirmed that its first tablet, the OnePlus Pad, will no longer be sold in Germany, effective immediately.
articles.content: The OnePlus Pad is now up for pre-order and, so far, looking like one of the best Android tablets in recent memory. Unfortunately, though, OnePlus Pad sales in Germany have been suspended, meaning yo… [+1842 chars]
